Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Pump cavitation noise observed. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 11/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
